description:
With a focused design that combines alpine-inspired performance with versatile casual style, the Stowe is a lightweight, packable, comfortable pant for active travel and everyday wear. Cotton and nylon blend to deliver natural fibre comfort with enhanced durability and moisture-wicking performance. Articulated knees and the gusseted crotch elevate freedom of movement, and storage includes pockets front and back, plus two low-profile zippered cargo pockets to secure your smartphone and passport.

This redesign has updated front and back hand pockets.
name: Arcteryx Stowe Pants, Reg - Mens
